text:
Hi,

When running the startup.bat file with JDK1.3.1 installed the startup script 
crashes with the errors below. With JDK1.3 it works fine.

Dave.

text:
Well, it's a JVM bug, and not a problem in the build script. The error occurs 
when creating the server socket (which is just a plain standard server socket).

If you can point out some problem with the Catalina code itself, then we'll be 
able to fix it.

The workaround is easy :
- use 1.3.0
- use 1.4 beta
Overall, I've had very bad experience with any of the bugfix builds of the JDK 
(1.3.0_01, ...).
creator: remm@apache.org
